DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To compare nurse-led clinic include person-centered care tight control `` care usual '' patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) moderate/ high disease activity . Project description : Study population : Patients RA , 18-80 yr old , moderate/ high Disease Activity Score 28 joint ( DAS28 > 3.8 ) disease duration > 2 yrs 6-month randomize control study 6 month open follow-up . Intervention group ( N=60 ) : Nurse-led visit every 6th week , structure person-centered care evaluation disease activity . If disease remission reach , pharmacological treatment include short-term ( intra-articular oral steroid ) long-term alteration ( DMARDs biologics ) modify accord predefined algorithm . The control group ( N=60 ) treat accord `` care usual '' visit physician every 6th month . Outcome measure : Primary outcome measure change Diseases Activity Score ( DAS ) . Secondary outcome quality life , self-efficacy , disability , emotional well-being , pain , fatigue , sleep satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: GotNet Study , The Gothenburg Nurse-led Tight Control Study
